A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: *Spoilers* Poorly developed plot. Kylo is still a whiny weakling. Very corny new Star Wars creatures that Disney very obviously made to sell toys. Snoke served zero purpose in the story apparently? Leia has been holding out on using the force until now? There was no epic jedi vs sith lightsaber fight. Luke died in such an odd and vague way. I’m still not sure how Rey is such a powerful Jedi with zero training. I mean it took Luke and Anakin/Vader like 3 movies each\, and they trained in each movie\, to become powerful like that. Star Wars has always had a powerful villain and for the past 2 movies I really can’t think of one. Everything seems very kiddy. At this point I’m not really sure where the franchise is going or how it is going to reroute it’s current course.
